subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray fended off a match point and defeated David Ferrer in an exhausting final that lasted 2 hours 45 minutes in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: Andy Murray fended off a match point and defeated David Ferrer in an exhausting final that lasted 2 hours 45 minutes in Key Biscayne, Fla.
